title: Utopian Ambience Game Music Vol. 1
description: Utopian Ambience Vol. 1 consists of 30 high quality ambient style tracks perfect for games which have themes of the future, sci-fi and utopias.
longDescription:
Utopian Ambience Vol. 1 consists of 30 high quality ambient style tracks perfect for games which have themes of the future, sci-fi and utopias, or even games which require just generally positive sounding ambient music.


Every track has 3 versions; a full version, a loopable version and a version with a "cut end" which is formatted in such a way as to be the first loop in a sequence, and which is then subsequently and seamlessly followed by the "looped" versions.


Preview here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EziDgIYjO54&t=967s


Utopian Ambience Vol. 1 contains:


A 5 Day Weekend [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

A Trip To The Beach [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

A Utopian Beach Trip [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

A Utopian Traffic Jam [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Above The Clouds [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

An Interplanetary Holiday [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Aura Cleanse Clinic [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Frosty Vibes [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Futuristic African Plains [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Futuristic Tropical Utopia [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Futuristic Zen Meditation [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Futuristic Zen Meditation II [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Holiday In Japan [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Inner Soul Warmth [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Love Frequency [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Nature Reserve [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Resigned [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Soma [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Stepping Out The Party [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Success Story [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Taffy Heights [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

The Coconut Bar [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

The End Never Came [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

The High Life [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Tropical Paradise Vibes [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Ultimate Utopian Music [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Utopian Bliss [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Utopian Jungle Retreat [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Utopian Shopping Trip [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]

Utopian Ski Trip [FULL, LOOP & CUT END]
